text:
When creating a war file. It puts dir classes and lib under WEB-INF but the 
deployment descriptor falls under "web-inf" (lower case).
Same deal with the manifest, it falls under "meta-inf" (lower case) instead of 
META-INF.

Thank you very much

dmlobo
creator: dani_lobo@yahoo.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
How do you see that?  Have you "unzipped" a war archive or is it just the display
of some tool.  Some Windows tools try to help you and assume that all uppercase
filenames must have been created on a DOS box - and convert them to all lowercase
when they display them.

<war> takes care of the case and explicitly uses WEB-INF/ and META-INF/.
